keywords.DESCRIPTION: Increase damage, #yBlock and #yPotency of a card by #b50%. Can be stacked additively. #yEnhance is removed after the card is played.
Remove one level of #yUpgrade and any #yEnhance or #yStasis from a card.
Prevent a card from being #yExhausted once and discard it instead or from losing #yEnhancement once. Cannot be stacked.
Potency is the power of a rune when it is #yCrafted.
Create a rune using #yElements. If rune cannot be crafted, gain that many #yElements instead. You can have no more than 7 active runes.
Elements (Ignis, Terra and Aqua) are spent to #yCraft runes and are used for other utilities.
Destroy a rune and activate its effect twice. Power-based effects will be removed before the start of your next turn.
Rune: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Rune: Deals damage to random enemies.
Rune: Heals on #yBreak or at the end of combat.
Rune: Deals damage to random enemy and gain Block.
Lose all selected #yElement then gain other #yElements equals to the amount lost and perform certain action depending on the #yElement chosen.
Rune: Reduces an enemy #yStrength for a turn.
Decreases attack damage by #b1 per stack. Stack is reduced by #b1 at the end of turn. NL Removes #ySlow when stack reaches #b0.
